name: Brine
description: Stranded at an Island, the Vessel is broked, do whatever it takes to survive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 915 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 64bit Processor: 3Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
